Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class HtmlLegendPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractPlugin
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.CharbaPlugin<HtmlLegendOptions>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.HtmlLegendPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin
    final class HtmlLegendPlugin
extends CharbaPlugin<HtmlLegendOptions>
    This plugin implements a HTML legend in order to give more flexibility to who needs to customize the legend.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addLegendElement​(Div chartElement, Div legendElement, Position position, int padding)
      Adds the HTML legend element to the right position in the chart element, depending on Position set for legend.

      Adds the event listeners to all elements created by legend callback.
      (package private) HtmlLegendOptions createDefaultOptionInstance()
      Creates an options instance as default.

      Creates a HTML element id for chart legend.
      The format is:
      [chartId]-legend
      (package private) Set<String> getPluginAddedLegendStatus()
      Returns the map of cached added legend labels status.
      (package private) Map<String,​Div> getPluginDivElements()
      Returns the map of cached DIV elements of HTML legend.
      (package private) Map<String,​List<LegendLabelItem>> getPluginLegendLabelsItems()
      Returns the map of cached legend labels items.
      private boolean isAfterCanvas​(IsChart chart, Div legendElement)
      Returns true if the legend element has been added to chart element after the canvas one.
      private void manageLegendDisplay​(IsChart chart, HtmlLegendOptions pOptions)
      Manages if the legend must be displayed or not based on choice of user and what can be changed in the chart configuration after the chart initialization bu a chart.reconfigure.
      private void manageLegendElement​(IsChart chart, Div legendElement, Position position)
      Manages the HTML legend element to the right position in the chart element, depending on Position set for legend.
      This method is called when a legend element is already added and the position could be changed comparing when the element has been created.
      private boolean mustAddToBottom​(Position position)
      Checks if the legend must be added in the chart element on top or bottom.
      private boolean mustBeDisplay​(IsChart chart)
      Returns true if the plugin must be manage the legend, creating it.
      void onAfterDraw​(IsChart chart)
      Called after the 'chart' has been drawn.

        private void manageLegendDisplay​(IsChart chart,
                                 HtmlLegendOptions pOptions)
        Manages if the legend must be displayed or not based on choice of user and what can be changed in the chart configuration after the chart initialization bu a chart.reconfigure.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to manage
        pOptions - plugin option for the chart

      • addLegendElement

        private void addLegendElement​(Div chartElement,
                              Div legendElement,
                              Position position,
                              int padding)
        Adds the HTML legend element to the right position in the chart element, depending on Position set for legend.
        Parameters:
        chartElement - chart HTML element
        legendElement - legend HTML element
        position - position set by legend configuration object
        padding - padding set by legend configuration object

      • manageLegendElement

        private void manageLegendElement​(IsChart chart,
                                 Div legendElement,
                                 Position position)
        Manages the HTML legend element to the right position in the chart element, depending on Position set for legend.
        This method is called when a legend element is already added and the position could be changed comparing when the element has been created.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        legendElement - legend HTML element
        position - position set by legend configuration object

      • mustAddToBottom

        private boolean mustAddToBottom​(Position position)
        Checks if the legend must be added in the chart element on top or bottom.
        Parameters:
        position - position set by legend configuration object
        Returns:
        true if the legend must be added to bottom
